title: Syzygies of the residue field over Golod rings
authors:
Doan Trung Cuong, Hailong Dao, David Eisenbud, Toshinori Kobayashi,
  Claudia Polini, Bernd Ulrich
abstract:
Let $(R,m,k)$ be a Golod ring. We show a recurrent formula for high syzygies
of $k$ interms of previous ones. In the case of embedding dimension at most
$2$, we provided complete descriptions of all indecomposable summands of all
syzygies of $k$.
